item.title: VINOD KHANDKAR U-21ALL INDIA GOLD CUP HOCKEY, JHANSI
item.dc:creator: Vicky
item.description: Dear Hockey Enthusiast, Welcome to the thrilling world of VINOD KHANDKAR U-21ALL INDIA GOLD CUP HOCKEY, JHANSI! Whether you’re a seasoned fan or a newcomer to the sport, we’re delighted to have you join us in celebrating the excitement, skill, and camaraderie that make hockey a truly remarkable game. Get ready to witness the lightning-fast […]
item.content:encoded:
Dear Hockey Enthusiast,

Welcome to the thrilling world of VINOD KHANDKAR U-21ALL INDIA GOLD CUP HOCKEY, JHANSI! Whether you’re a seasoned fan or a newcomer to the sport, we’re delighted to have you join us in celebrating the excitement, skill, and camaraderie that make hockey a truly remarkable game.

Get ready to witness the lightning-fast pace, jaw-dropping goals, and bone-crushing hits that define this incredible sport. From the finesse of stickhandling to the thunderous roar of the crowd after a game-winning goal, every moment is an opportunity for pure adrenaline.

As you embark on this hockey journey with us, we invite you to share in the passion, dedication, and teamwork that make hockey more than just a game – it’s a way of life. Whether you’re here for the nail-biting playoffs, the heart-pounding overtime thrillers, or the sheer joy of a well-executed power play, you’re in for an unforgettable experience.

item.title: होटल नटराज सरोवर पोर्टिको
item.dc:creator: Vicky
item.description: होटल नटराज सरोवर पोर्टिको, झाँसी में चार्टर्ड एकाउंटेंट एसोसिएशन द्वारा आयोजित वर्कशॉप में हमारे मैनेजिंग डायरेक्टर झांसी सदर विधायक श्री रवि शर्मा जी के साथ शिष्टाचार ग्रुप फ़ोटो में स्वागत करते हुए
item.content:encoded: होटल नटराज सरोवर पोर्टिको, झाँसी में चार्टर्ड एकाउंटेंट एसोसिएशन द्वारा आयोजित वर्कशॉप में हमारे मैनेजिंग डायरेक्टर झांसी सदर विधायक श्री रवि शर्मा जी के साथ शिष्टाचार ग्रुप फ़ोटो में स्वागत करते हुए

item.title: Sales Vacancy
item.dc:creator: Vicky
item.description: Need young energetic, male/female for our city sales office and site sales offices at Hansari, Gram Buda, Gram Bhojla and Gram Baratha. Min. graduates, with good communication skills and pleasing personality. Own vehicle preferred. Salary will be the best in the industry. Please post you resume with photograph.
item.content:encoded: Need young energetic, male/female for our city sales office and site sales offices at Hansari, Gram Buda, Gram Bhojla and Gram Baratha. Min. graduates, with good communication skills and pleasing personality. Own vehicle preferred. Salary will be the best in the industry. Please post you resume with photograph.

item.title: Happy New Year 2024
item.dc:creator: Vicky
item.description: May the coming year be filled with joy, prosperity, and an abundance of positive moments. Let’s cherish the memories of the past, learn from our experiences, and look forward to a future filled with hope and endless possibilities. Wishing you and your loved ones a year ahead filled with happiness, good health, and the fulfillment […]
item.content:encoded: May the coming year be filled with joy, prosperity, and an abundance of positive moments. Let’s cherish the memories of the past, learn from our experiences, and look forward to a future filled with hope and endless possibilities. Wishing you and your loved ones a year ahead filled with happiness, good health, and the fulfillment of your aspirations. Happy New Year 2024!

item.title: महिला व्यापार मण्डल, झाँसी द्वारा आयोजित प्रदर्शनी ‘‘सृजन’’
